project_descr: after-school tutoring and mentoring programme provided by Lankai university students to pilot middle schools in Nankai and Tanggu districts in order to prevent the premature access to the labor market

donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: UNV, CICETE, CYVA and TYVA are working in partnership on a pilot project to mobilize 130 university volunteers from Nankai University to provide after-school tutoring and mentoring to about 500 migrant youths in two pilot middle schools in Nankai and Tanggu districts. The activity seeks to demonstrate the efficient role of volunteerism in improving the academic performance and social inclusion of migrant students in order to improve access to formal education and prevent pre-mature entry into the labour force.

project_title: volunteer mentoring for migrant youth, mdg-f yem
